name: Numbers (JustADev&APlayer)
description:
NUMBERS
A Number Guessing Game

Just pick a number in your head and the "AI" (sounds better than 'computer') will try to guess it. If it can't guess it in 15 tries, you won. It's my first game so don't expect much. I warned you.

Known issues:

  • on low resolution buttons don't work for some reason (or they work strangely)
  • the quit button just crashes the game (sometimes)
  • lack of creativity

Made with:

  • Unity Engine (Check it out, it's a cool and easy-to-use dev tool! If you don't know it, then crawl out the rock you lived under for the last 10 years!)
  • MonoDevelop (Unity's built-in IDE for C# and Javascript)

Upcoming:

  • Difficulty settings

Credits:

  • Programming(C#): JustADev&APlayer
  • Graphics: the game doesn't have exact graphics, so no graphics designer here
